name: Grass-Fed Angus Beef Steaks

name: Artisanal Cheddar Cheese
description: Handcrafted aged cheddar cheese, rich and flavorful, ideal for pairing with crackers or wine.

name: Organic Free-Range Eggs
description: Farm-fresh organic eggs from free-range chickens, high in protein and nutrients.

name: Grass-Fed Bison Burgers
description: Lean and flavorful grass-fed bison burgers, a healthier alternative to beef burgers.

name: Aged Gouda Cheese
description: Rich and nutty aged Gouda cheese, perfect for snacking or melting over dishes.

name: Grass-Fed Beef Jerky
description: Tender and flavorful grass-fed beef jerky, ideal for on-the-go snacking or hiking trips.

name: Smoked Salmon Fillet
description: Premium quality smoked salmon fillet, delicately smoked for a rich flavor.

name: Blue Stilton Cheese
description: Sharp and creamy Blue Stilton cheese, perfect for cheese platters or salads.

name: Free-Range Chicken Breast
description: Tender and juicy free-range chicken breast, versatile for grilling, baking, or sautéing.

name: Aged Parmesan Cheese
description: Nutty and savory aged Parmesan cheese, grated or shaved over pasta dishes or salads.

name: Angus Beef Ribeye Steak
description: Juicy and flavorful Angus beef ribeye steak, perfect for a luxurious dinner.

name: Camembert Cheese Wheel
description: Creamy and indulgent Camembert cheese wheel, ideal for spreading on crackers or bread.
